login.securityWarning: Tani waa goob ilaalisan. Dhammaan isku dayada galitaanka ayaa la kormeeraa oo la duubaa. Isku dayada gelitaanka aan la oggolayn waa la soo sheegi doonaa.

verification.allComplete: Dhammaan xaqiijinada way dhammaadeen! Dib u habaynaya...

errors.invalidCredentials: Iimaylka ama erayga sirta ah ma sax aha
errors.loginFailed: Galitaanku wuu fashilmay. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
errors.sessionExpired: Kulanka aad haysatid wuu dhacay. Fadlan mar kale gal.
errors.resendFailed: Dib u dirida lambarka way fashilantay
errors.invalidAuthCredentials: Aqoonsiga xaqiijinta ayaa aan sax ahayn
errors.notAuthenticated: Lama xaqiijin - lama bixin calaamad ama madax X-User-Id
errors.registrationFailed: Diiwaangelinta way fashilantay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
errors.failedRetrieveProvinceInfo: Soo celinta macluumaadka gobolka ayaa fashilmay
errors.failedRetrieveUserInfo: Soo celinta macluumaadka isticmaalaha ayaa fashilmay
